CmdLine: apk add --no-cache python3 &&     python3 -m ensurepip &&     rm -r /usr/lib/python*/ensurepip &&     pip3 install --upgrade pip setuptools &&     if [ ! -e /usr/bin/pip ]; then ln -s pip3 /usr/bin/pip ; fi &&     if [[ ! -e /usr/bin/python ]]; then ln -sf /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python; fi &&     rm -r /root/.cache
Commands.Name: run
